intro: Camchaya, commonly known as the golden shower tree, is a tropical plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rutaceae and is characterized by its showy, yellow flowers that bloom in long, hanging clusters. The plant has simple, alternate leaves that are usually elliptical in shape.
